title: Which is correct (if any), 'In October of the same year' or 'The same year in October'? - Quora

response.answer_text: The second doesn’t make sense unless you put a comma after ‘year’: “The same year, in October …”.Or merge the two sentences: “In the same year, in October of the same year…”
I would say ‘In October of the same year' sounds more correct. But mind you, in formal writing it might serve you better to say ‘In October of the said year'.
